problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形OCBC是菱形,点A、B在以点O为圆心的圆弧DE上,若AO=3,∠COE=∠DOA,则扇形ODE的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral OCBC is a diamond, and the points A and B are on the arc DE with the point O as the center. If AO = N_0, ∠COE = ∠DOA, then the area of ​​the sector ODE is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OB．∵OA=OB=OC=AB=BC,∴∠AOB=∠COB=60°,∴∠AOB+∠BOC=120°．又∵∠COE=∠DOA,∴∠DOE=120°．∴扇形ODE的面积为\frac{120π×9}{360}=3π．故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题综合运用了菱形的性质、等边三角形的性质和扇形的面积公式．
